thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 17 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Amazon Launches The International Shopping Experience In The Amazon Shopping App

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Amazon Launches The International Shopping Experience In The Amazon Shopping App
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc:
* AMAZON LAUNCHES THE INTERNATIONAL SHOPPING EXPERIENCE IN THE AMAZON SHOPPING APP
* AMAZON.COM INC - NEW ZEALAND CUSTOMERS CAN BROWSE AND SHOP OVER 45 MILLION ELIGIBLE ITEMS THAT CAN BE SHIPPED TO THEIR COUNTRY FROM UNITED STATES
* AMAZON.COM - ‘INTERNATIONAL SHOPPING’ EXPERIENCE AVAILABLE ON MOBILE BROWSER & MOBILE APP WITHIN AMAZON SHOPPING APP FOR BOTH IOS AND ANDROID MOBILE DEVICES
* AMAZON.COM - INTERNATIONAL SHOPPING EXPERIENCE OFFERS SHOPPING IN 5 LANGUAGES, INCLUDING ENGLISH, SPANISH, SIMPLIFIED CHINESE, GERMAN, BRAZILIAN PORTUGUESE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
